title: S.D.M.G.
summaries: The S.D.M.G. (Space Dolphin Machine Gun) is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord gun. It can be considered an endgame upgrade of the Megashark, with a slightly faster firing rate, a 66% chance not to consume ammunition, and a noticeably higher damage output. Its abilities are also similar to those of the Chain Gun, but it is more precise and deals significantly more damage, though with a slightly slower rate of fire. The S.D.M.G. also has a base 14% critical strike chance, as opposed to the usual 4%. The S.D.M.G. has a 2/9 (22.22%) chance to be dropped from the Moon Lord.
